class Command:


[docs]
    def execute(self):
        pass








[docs]
class Copy(Command):


[docs]
    def execute(self):
        print("Copying ...!")








[docs]
class Paste(Command):


[docs]
    def execute(self):
        print("Pasting ...!")








[docs]
class Save(Command):


[docs]
    def execute(self):
        print("Saving ...!")








[docs]
class Macro:
    def __init__(self):
        self.commands = []



[docs]
    def add(self, command):
        self.commands.append(command)





[docs]
    def run(self):
        for o in self.commands:
            o.execute()








[docs]
def main():
    macro = Macro()
    macro.add(Copy())
    macro.add(Paste())
    macro.add(Save())
    macro.run()




if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
